item.description:
To Celebrate Boston Fashion Week, the Boston Fashion Meetup Group has teamed up with a number of great organizations including the MFA, TJX, and Betsey Johnson to bring you a night of Networking, Food, Fashion, & Fun to raise money for Ovations for the Cure.

Come join us as prominent industry professionals and organizational leaders of Boston's creative industries share their thoughts on Fashion, Arts, & Entertainment in Boston.

THE LINE UP for the evening includes...

A Special Betsey Johnson Fashion Show hosted by Dynasty Models with Hair & Make Up by Emerge Spa & Salon with an Introduction by Alexandria Hall, Editor of Fashion Boston Magazine

Master of Ceremonies:
(Popular Radio Personality) Kennedy, from Karson & Kennedy on MIX 104.1

Speakers / Presenters Include:
Joyce Kulhawik, Art & Entertainment Critic
Stacy Scarsella, Senior Art Buyer, TJX
Lauren Whitley, Curator for the Museum of Fine Art's David and Roberta Logie Department of Textile and Fashion Arts
Jason Schupbach, Massachusetts Creative Economies Director
Joe G. Dilorenzo, Chief Financial Officer of Plymouth Rock Studios
Mary Chiochios, Director of Operations for the MA Film Office

Lifetime Achievement Award Recipient
Yolanda Cellucci, Former Owner & Founder of Yolanda's Bridal Salon, Heath Club & Fitness Spa

Special Celebrity Guests Include:
Amanda Kelly, Miss Massachusetts 2009 (Miss America Pageant)
Korto Momolu, Fashion Designer & Project Runway Season 5 Finalist
Bianca Golden, America's Next Top Model Cycle 9 Contestant
Sandra Nyanchoka, America's Next Top Model Cycle 12 Contestant.

Boston Fashion Meetup members pay $40 as long as you purchase your tickets through meetup.com.
Just RSVP and you will be asked to submit a payment via paypal. It's easy to use, fast and simple.

Tickets will be available for purchase at the door for $50 or you can purchase them with a credit card by visiting
worldfashionevents.com

V.I.P. tickets are also available and Include front row seating for all the Presentations and Betsey Johnson Fashion Show, an Ovations Gift Bag, and complimentary champagne. For more information or to purchase V.I.P. tickets visit worldfashionevents.com

All Proceeds from this event will be donated to Ovations for the Cure - http://www.ovationsfo...

This is sure to be a stellar event as well as a great networking and informational opportunity as you will hear from some of Boston's top fashion and entertainment minds and interact with various industry professionals from boutique owners, models, stylists, and designers.

See You There!!!
item.name: Fashion Strikes Back - A Fashion, Arts, & Entertainment Summit (October Meetup)
